name: Tank Hurricane
description:
In Tank Hurricane you have to fight in a tank battle with AI, which will not let you get bored. Shells destroy the environment, so be careful when shooting.
Knock down packages to heal and use shields. Use the ability of the tank to fly to take a more advantageous tactical position. Complete tasks to improve your skills in the game.
There is also a Player vs Player mode, where you can fight against another person on the same computer.

Features:
-Interesting gameplay
-12 Tasks
-Destructible landscape
- Player vs. player mode
